name: Relativity (Demo)
description:
Keyboard Controls:

• Move with arrows, AWSD.
• Jump with space
o Wall climb – jump while pressing the arrow, directional pad in the direction
of the wall you are facing.
o Wall leap – Press the opposite direction of wall once you make contact with
wall.
o Jump off wall – Jump while pressing no directional buttons and wall sliding.
• Shoot – Aim by pressing left shift and shoot with Z
• Dash – left control.
• Interact – left alt. For accessing terminals. Also use this to drop while standing on a
certain platform by pressing down and interact.

PC Controller:
